# Kazuhiko Sugawara

|birth_place =Tomakomai, Hokkaido, Japan
|death_date =
|sport = Speed skating
|club=Tomakomai Paper Factory
|height=165 cm
|weight=50 kg
|pb=500 m – 44.2 (1951)1500 m – 2:26.4 (1952)5000 m – 8:35.0 (1952)10000 m – 17:34.0 (1952)
}}
was a Japanese speed skater who competed in the 1952 Winter Olympics. He finished seventh in the 10000 m and 15th in the 5000 m event.
